dict.acceptation: 退休金，养老金；膳宿费；生活津贴；寄宿学校；
发给…养老金[退休金]；准予退休，强迫退休（并发给退休金）；

sent.orig: Pension funds in employees ′ personal pension fund accounts.
sent.trans: 劳工个人专户之退休金。

sent.orig: The wage substitute rate of pension is very important to the pension social insurance.
sent.trans: 养老金的工资替代率对养老金的支出规模和养老社会保险的缴费率都有着决定性的意义。

sent.orig: In China, occupational pension is the second pillar in the pension system of three pillars.
sent.trans: 企业年金在中国处于养老保险体系“三支柱”中的第二位。

sent.orig: Growing occupational pension will be an important part of building multi-level pension system in China.
sent.trans: 大力发展企业年金是我国构建多层次养老保险体系的重要内容。

sent.orig: To adapt to the reformation of retirement pension system, the enterprise should regenerate the pension accounting.
sent.trans: 为了适应我国养老金制度改革的需要，我国企业养老金会计也应做相应改革。
